definition: serving to set in motion, the ceremonial induction into a position
details:
adjective
- serving to set in motion
= example: serving to set in motion
= synonyms: first
- occurring at or characteristic of a formal investiture or induction
= example: occurring at or characteristic of a formal investiture or induction
noun
- the ceremonial induction into a position
= synonyms: inauguration
- an address delivered at an inaugural ceremony (especially by a United States president)
= synonyms: inaugural address
